Release.Changes:
Version 0.59.13:

- Added Floette Stats Reset. (credit Nymphea)
- Added Friendship Farmer. (credit dolphincurry)
- Restaurant Farmer and Jacinthe can now recover from being unable to focus.
- Stall Buyer can now buy multiple types of items. (credit pif)
- Fixed Bench Sit not working against walls. (reported by bgoproton, credit Gin)
- Improved reliability of dialog detection. (reported by chaochii, credit Gin)
- Improved game close sequence. (credit jw)
- PLZA programs will now enforce a video resolution of >= 720p and an aspect ratio of 16:9.
- Wild Zone Entrance will now automatically reset to recover from minor errors. (reported by scorchtail)
- Wild Zone Entrance will explicitly tell you that it cannot be used for paths that are prone to getting attacked. (reported by gasterblasteral)
- Added support for AZERTY layout for keyboard controller. (credit pifopi)
- Fixed Restaurant Farmer for non-AI mode. (reported by ry4242)
- Fixed Wild Zone Entrance Zone 1 being broken. (reported by Nikki, credit Gin)
- Fixed corner case in Wild Zone Entrance where a day change at the wrong time can break the program. (reported by scorchtail, credit Gin)
- Improved reliability of Wild Zone Entrance. (reported by lukeb5622, credit Gin)
- Improved reliability of Auto-Fossil. (reported by lukeb5622)
- Mitigations for a hang in the Pico W. (reported by h0ly0, tryvl)

Due to the difficulty of setting up the Floette program, it is currently untested by anyone else besides the author Nymphea. So please let us know if you encounter any issues.

Beta.Changes:
Version 0.59.5:

- The Restaurant Farmer can now automatically select moves based on type effectiveness.
- Hopefully fixed more Restaurant Farmer hangs. (reported by numerous people)
- Bench Sit should be less CPU resource intensive. (reported by dlewis3040)

Version 0.59.4:

- The Restaurant Farmer now has a button to stop after the current run.
- More fixes to the Restaurant Farmer. (reported by elitheguy, frostedgeulleisia, and mendedpearl)

PrivateBeta.Changes:
Version 0.56.4 (beta):

- The ESP32 will now connect to the Switch 2!
- The ESP32-S3 now lets you pick between the Switch 1 and Switch 2 wired controllers.
- Improved reliability of SV eggs with a new path to navigate to the egg basket.
- SV egg programs will fix your game settings.
- SV egg programs will warn you if it thinks your language is wrong.
- Fixed another program crash. (from error reports)

A lot of changes happened to the firmware, so you will need to flash new .hex and .bin files regardless of what you are using.

Note that all 4 shiny hunting LGPE programs have been affected by the new firmware changes due to the game disconnecting all controllers when SR'ing. This "just happened" to work in the past, but with the new firmware, it has become a lot more delicate.

As of today, these 4 programs should be working fine on the Switch 2 (only Gift Reset has been tested). But Switch 1 is more precarious since we are unable to get the ESP32 to reliably reconnect to the Switch outside of the grip menu. (for some reason it works perfectly on the Switch 2 - ironic yes)
